sentences: Tasuku Hatanaka (畠中 祐, Hatanaka Tasuku, born August 17, 1994) is a Japanese actor, voice actor and singer from Sagamihara, Kanagawa Prefecture, best known as the voice of Yuma Tsukumo in the anime series Yu-Gi-Oh!
In 2016, he was listed among the Best Voice Actors for Newtype Anime Awards for 2015-16.
Since 2013, Hatanaka has been employed by Ken Production.
On December 29, 2019, the agency I'm Enterprise announced in a statement that Hatanaka (who is with Ken Production) and fellow voice actress from I'm Enterprise, Sayaka Senbongi, have gotten married.
